# Q&A with Shauna Mae Hartsook, Co-Founder and Creative Chief at Boldfaced Goods * Report this article 
 Shannon Hewlko Shannon Hewlko 
### Shannon Hewlko ... with co-founder Lauren Stanley at

what_you_do: Guiding introverted women of color to get seen, heard, and respected by embracing their AWESOME™ and communicating with wholeness and boldness at work, home, and beyond.
seeking: Partnerships and collaborations to help introverted women of color embrace their AWESOME™
offering: Practical strategies, entertaining stories, and a dash of 'woo' to help people think, talk, and take action with empathy, energy, and encouragement
social_proof: Amazon international bestseller, Alignable 2022, Toastmasters DTM award, Brainz 500 Global award, Women Who Rock award, Education 2.0 Leadership award
signature_programs: Embrace Your AWESOME™, Engage Your Gifts, Empower Your World
business_focus: Helping introverted women of color embrace their AWESOME™ and communicate with confidence
